events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. This is quite disappointing.
Based on the customer's request for money back due to incorrect item delivery, this case is categorized under the Refund cluster.
Assigning the refund case to agent Sarah M. for follow-up and resolution.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I will assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number for verification?
To proceed with your refund, please send us the order number and photos of the item you received versus what you originally ordered.
My order number is 23456789. I attached pictures showing that I got a blue jacket instead of the red one I paid for.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and the solution. I appreciate the pre-paid return label and refund process.
The refund has been approved and should be credited to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to confirm that you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything was handled smoothly. Thank you for your help!
Closing this case now since the refund has been successfully completed and confirmed by the customer.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback about your recent refund experience.
